root.name: Anubis II
root.description: Anubis II is a platform game for the Nintendo Wii. It is generally regarded as one of the worst games on the system. The game consists of you playing as some type of dog like thing that must collect tiny pyramids scattered through each of the five levels. Despite the title there is no previous in the series.PC System RequirementsOS: Windows 2000/XPProcessor: 500 MHzMemory: 256 MBVideo Memory: DirectX CompatibleSound Card: DirectX CompatibleDirectX: 9.0

similar_games.game: Billy the Wizard: Rocket Broomstick Racing
